game_description: This game has unique locomotion where you play as a capuchin and roam around alone or with friends. You can roam around, get eaten by Dave, explore the environment, learn new ways to move, What more would you need other then to be a capuchin?!
review_1: so what happened to capuchin is three months ago capuchin was running like normal along with the discord's server, a couple days after capuchins server got hacked and no one was able to chat anymore, there was a link being spammed in the chat that sent you to a doxxed site. Duttbust(the owner of capuchin) didnt want people to get doxxed, so she shut down the server, FOR GOOD. Later on capuchin the game was hacked, the hackers got into playfab and duttbusts account. So they changed the game completely.and when you joined the game, your hands were circled and you were on a red platform with blue boards, and on the boards shows your IP address, your irl name and phone number, and a couple of other thing, no dave no online, no nothing. In the background it played extremely explicit music about doxxing, examples of the lyrics were "i just crashed your f_____ door" and "break into your f_____ house and crash your f_____ car" and a button that said click me that sent you to a web that shut down your headset and PERMANENTLY glitched and broke it. Duttbust had enough and shut down playfab( the online, dave and cosmetics) later the discord was back and duttbust said "no more, im done with capuchin, no more updates for ever" so she was gone and capuchin was dead, fortunately the hackers aren't able to hack anymore. So for 2 months no one was able to play online BUT DONT WORRY because duttbust said “ f___ it IM COMING BACK” and is currently giving the game to others and remaking the game completely, also changing the engine from photons to mirror do i the devs keep doing their thing capuchin could be back in a couple of weeks or even days!🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌 Fyi doxxing means getting someone's personal information.
